metadata.title: CVE-2018-11727 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The libfsntfs_attribute_read_from_mft function inlibfsntfs_attribute.c in libfsntfs through 2018-04-20 allows remoteattackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read)via a crafted ntfs file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described inlibyal/libfsntfs issue 8 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: libfsntfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
